title: [Large-Scale] Adaptive Language Learning Program Design for Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic language proficiency, no work experience related to the language
context.additional_context: Job-focused language training for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, establishing personalized learning environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use 200 job-related linguistic expressions categorized by situational context
Learners can correct over 80% of grammatical errors by receiving personalized feedback through an adaptive system
Learners can design three or more personalized learning pathways based on learning style diagnostic results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
